result.execSummary:
The defendant Chad N Meier was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

Submit to an AODA assessment, follow through with any treatment, counseling.  No use or possession of alcohol or illegal drugs/drug paraphernalia. Comply with random urine screens.  Maintain absolute sobriety. No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.

Provide DNA Specimen unless previously obtained. Surcharge is imposed. Driver's License is Revoked for 6 Months, concurrent. 
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

timeConds.notes: Non-working hours. Release for standard conditions. STAYED - for use of agent's discretion.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Chad N Meier

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Wis. Dept. of Corrections notice of case status change received.  Outstanding financial obligations have been satisfied.

Notice of Court Ordered Financial Obligations Status
Discharge date: 11/05/16
records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Associated with Charge #1

Defendant Chad N Meier in court with attorney Thomas C Simon.  Jayne Davis Dewire appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called for sentencing hearing.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Simon makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  WITHHELD SENTENCE

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR   **CONCURRENT**   *Transfer allowed to Milwaukee County* 

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
____Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
____No Use or Possession of alcohol or illegal drugs 
____No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
____DNA sample to be provided if not yet previously done 

DRIVER'S LICENSE REVOCATION:  6 MONTHS - CONCURRENT

COSTS:  $268.00 & $250.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid as a condition of probation)

CONDITION TIME:  30 Days, Non-working hours with standard release conditions - STAYED - to be used at agent's discretion

Felony Warnings, Voting Rights and Firearms Warnings provided to defendant
Sentencing hearing at 11-05-2015 03:30 pm
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Chad N Meier in court with Attorney Thomas C Simon.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called for plea hearing.  Defendant enters a no contest plea to Count #1.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #1.  Attorney Simon requests a sentencing date approximately 3 weeks out.  Court adjourns sentencing.   Bail remains as fixed.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
Plea hearing at 10-01-2015 09:30 am

Defendant Chad N Meier in court with Attorney Thomas C Simon.  Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Simon states that he just received a new offer from the state yesterday and requests an adjournment.  Court adjourns.  Bail remains as fixed.  Plea hearing scheduled for October 1, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 18, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Chad N Meier in court with Attorney Thomas C Simon.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Simon requests a plea and sentence date.    Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 18, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
Hearing on August 12, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Chad N Meier in court with Attorney Thomas C Simon.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Kelly Pingel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Simon requests an adjournment so he can determine the status of Defendant's Milwaukee County cases.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for August 12, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Hearing on July 6, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.
Defendant Chad N Meier in court with attorney Thomas C Simon.  Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 28, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.
